alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:06PM EST until January 10 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Midland and Bay Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A burst of heavy, wet snow is expected to lead to rapid accumulations Tuesday morning. The combination with strong wind gusts up to 35 mph could result in some downed tree limbs and sporadic power outages. Rising temperatures will likely cause snow to mix with or change to rain during the afternoon, but low confidence exists that snow, possibly heavy, will continue through Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
